description: This file is a BitBake recipe file (`nginx.inc`) for building, configuring, and installing the Nginx web server within a Yocto Project build environment. It contains metadata, dependencies, configuration options, installation instructions, and scripts related to Nginx.

methods.name: do_configure
methods.description: Configures the Nginx build with custom parameters based on system architecture and options.

methods.name: do_install
methods.description: Handles the installation of Nginx, setup of configuration files, init scripts, systemd services, and web root directories.

methods.name: pkg_postinst:${PN}
methods.description: Post-installation script to create required volatile files and directories if applicable.
